name: Etiqa
description: Etiqa is one of Malaysia's largest insurance and takaful providers, part of the Maybank Group. Known for competitive motor insurance pricing and a strong digital presence.
cons: Customer service can be slow during peak periods

name: Allianz
description: Allianz Malaysia is part of the global Allianz Group, one of the world's largest insurance companies. Offers comprehensive coverage across all insurance categories.
pros: Global brand with strong financial backing
Road warrior add-on for car insurance
cons: Premiums can be higher than local providers
Limited branch network compared to local insurers

name: Tokio Marine
description: Tokio Marine is Japan's oldest insurance company with a strong presence in Malaysia. Known for reliable car insurance and efficient claims processing.
cons: Less brand recognition among younger Malaysians
Online portal could be more user-friendly

name: AIA
description: AIA is one of Asia's largest life insurance groups. In Malaysia, AIA is particularly known for health insurance and medical cards with extensive panel hospital coverage.
cons: Premiums can be on the higher side

name: Great Eastern
description: Great Eastern is the oldest and most established life insurance company in Malaysia and Singapore. Known for reliable life and health insurance products.

name: Zurich
description: Zurich Malaysia (formerly MAA Takaful) offers both conventional insurance and takaful products. Part of the Swiss-based Zurich Insurance Group.
cons: Brand transition from MAA can cause confusion

name: Prudential
description: Prudential Malaysia is a leading life insurer known for comprehensive medical and life insurance products. Their PRUServe platform offers digital convenience.

name: Takaful Malaysia
description: Takaful Malaysia is the country's first and largest takaful operator. As a Shariah-compliant insurer, it's the go-to choice for Muslims seeking halal insurance coverage.

name: Kurnia
fullName: Berjaya Sompo Insurance Berhad (formerly Kurnia Insurance)
description: Kurnia (now part of Berjaya Sompo) is one of Malaysia's most recognized motor insurance brands. Known for affordable car insurance and extensive workshop network.
cons: Now merged with Berjaya Sompo â€” brand transition

name: MSIG
description: MSIG is part of the MS&AD Insurance Group, one of Japan's largest insurance groups. Offers a range of general insurance products in Malaysia.
